In England, in the seven days to 26 August, there were 24,674 new confirmed cases (43.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 August, there were 30,675 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 20% (6,001 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 31 August is 19,833,314 (35,072.1 cases per 100,000 population).
